verses.verse: <S%G2744>Boasting<s%> is <S%G1163>necessary,<s%> <S%G3303>though<s%> it is not <S%G4851>profitable;<s%> but I will <S%G2064>go<s%> on to <S%G3701>visions<s%> and <S%G602>revelations<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

I <S%G3609>know<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> who <S%G1180>fourteen<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> <S%G4253>ago<s%> – <S%G1535>whether<s%> in the <S%G4983>body<s%> I do not <S%G3609>know,<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> out of the <S%G4983>body<s%> I do not <S%G3609>know,<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3609>knows<s%> – <S%G5108>such<s%> a <S%G5108>man<s%> was <S%G726>caught<s%> up to the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G3772>heaven.<s%>

And I <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G3609>how<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> – <S%G1535>whether<s%> in the <S%G4983>body<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G5565>apart<s%> from the <S%G4983>body<s%> I do not <S%G3609>know,<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3609>knows<s%> –

was <S%G726>caught<s%> up into <S%G3857>Paradise,<s%> and <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G731>inexpressible<s%> <S%G4487>words,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> is not <S%G1832>permitted<s%> to <S%G2980>speak.<s%>

On <S%G5228>behalf<s%> of <S%G5108>such<s%> a <S%G5108>man<s%> will I <S%G2744>boast;<s%> but on my <S%G1683>own<s%> <S%G5228>behalf<s%> I will not <S%G2744>boast,<s%> <S%G1508>except<s%> in regard to [my] <S%G769>weaknesses.<s%>

For <S%G1437>if<s%> I do <S%G2309>wish<s%> to <S%G2744>boast<s%> I shall not be <S%G878>foolish,<s%> for I shall be <S%G3004>speaking<s%> the <S%G225>truth;<s%> but I <S%G5339>refrain<s%> [from this,] <S%G3361>so<s%> that <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> may <S%G3049>credit<s%> me with <S%G5228>more<s%> <S%G5228>than<s%> he <S%G991>sees<s%> [in] me <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G191>hears<s%> from me.

And because of the <S%G5236>surpassing<s%> <S%G5236>greatness<s%> of the <S%G602>revelations,<s%> for <S%G1352>this<s%> <S%G1352>reason,<s%> to <S%G3361>keep<s%> me from <S%G5229>exalting<s%> myself, there was <S%G1325>given<s%> me a <S%G4647>thorn<s%> in the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> a <S%G32>messenger<s%> of <S%G4567>Satan<s%> to <S%G2852>buffet<s%> me – to <S%G3361>keep<s%> me from <S%G5229>exalting<s%> myself!
<S%G5228>Concerning<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> I <S%G3870>entreated<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G5151>three<s%> <S%G5151>times<s%> that it might <S%G868>depart<s%> from me.

And He has <S%G3004>said<s%> to me, "My <S%G5485>grace<s%> is <S%G714>sufficient<s%> for you, for <S%G1411>power<s%> is <S%G5055>perfected<s%> in <S%G769>weakness<s%>." <S%G2234>Most<s%> <S%G2234>gladly,<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> I will <S%G3123>rather<s%> <S%G2744>boast<s%> <S%G1722>about<s%> my <S%G769>weaknesses,<s%> that the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> may <S%G1981>dwell<s%> in me.

<S%G1352>Therefore<s%> I <S%G2106>am<s%> <S%G2106>well<s%> <S%G2106>content<s%> with <S%G769>weaknesses,<s%> with <S%G5196>insults,<s%> with <S%G318>distresses,<s%> with <S%G1375>persecutions,<s%> with <S%G4730>difficulties,<s%> for Christ's <S%G5228>sake;<s%> for <S%G3752>when<s%> I <S%G770>am<s%> <S%G770>weak,<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G1415>strong.<s%>

I have <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G878>foolish;<s%> you <S%G4771>yourselves<s%> <S%G315>compelled<s%> me. <S%G1063>Actually<s%> I <S%G3784>should<s%> have been <S%G4921>commended<s%> by you, for in <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>respect<s%> was I <S%G5302>inferior<s%> to the <S%G5244>most<s%> <S%G5244>eminent<s%> <S%G652>apostles,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G1487>though<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> a <S%G3762>nobody.<s%>

The <S%G4592>signs<s%> of a true <S%G652>apostle<s%> were <S%G2716>performed<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you with <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5281>perseverance,<s%> by <S%G4592>signs<s%> and <S%G5059>wonders<s%> and <S%G1411>miracles.<s%>

For in <S%G5101>what<s%> respect were you <S%G2274>treated<s%> as <S%G2274>inferior<s%> to the <S%G3062>rest<s%> of the <S%G1577>churches,<s%> <S%G1508>except<s%> that I <S%G846>myself<s%> did not become a <S%G2655>burden<s%> to you? <S%G5483>Forgive<s%> me <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G93>wrong!<s%>

<S%G2400>Here<s%> for <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G5154>time<s%> I <S%G2192>am<s%> <S%G2093>ready<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> to you, and I will not be a <S%G2655>burden<s%> to you; for I do not <S%G2212>seek<s%> what is <S%G4771>yours,<s%> but you; for <S%G5043>children<s%> are not <S%G3784>responsible<s%> to <S%G2343>save<s%> up for [their] <S%G1118>parents,<s%> but <S%G1118>parents<s%> for [their] <S%G5043>children.<s%>

And I will <S%G2234>most<s%> <S%G2234>gladly<s%> <S%G1159>spend<s%> and be <S%G1550>expended<s%> for your <S%G5590>souls.<s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> I <S%G25>love<s%> you the <S%G4057>more,<s%> am I to be <S%G25>loved<s%> the <S%G7090>less<s%>?
But be that as it may, I did not <S%G2599>burden<s%> you <S%G1473>myself;<s%> <S%G235>nevertheless,<s%> <S%G3835>crafty<s%> fellow that I am, I <S%G2983>took<s%> you in by <S%G1388>deceit.<s%>
[Certainly] I have not <S%G4122>taken<s%> <S%G4122>advantage<s%> of you <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> of those <S%G3739>whom<s%> I have <S%G649>sent<s%> to you, have I?

I <S%G3870>urged<s%> <S%G5103>Titus<s%> [to go,] and <S%G4882>sent<s%> the <S%G80>brother<s%> with him. <S%G5103>Titus<s%> did not <S%G4122>take<s%> <S%G4122>any<s%> <S%G4122>advantage<s%> of you, did he? Did we not <S%G4043>conduct<s%> <S%G4043>ourselves<s%> in the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> [and walk] in the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G2487>steps<s%>?

<S%G3819>All<s%> <S%G3819>this<s%> <S%G3819>time<s%> you have been <S%G1380>thinking<s%> that we are <S%G626>defending<s%> ourselves to you. [Actually,] it is in the <S%G2713>sight<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> that we have been <S%G2980>speaking<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ;<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> for your <S%G3619>upbuilding,<s%> <S%G27>beloved.<s%>

For I <S%G5399>am<s%> <S%G5399>afraid<s%> that <S%G4458>perhaps<s%> when I <S%G2064>come<s%> I may <S%G2147>find<s%> you to be not <S%G3634>what<s%> I <S%G2309>wish<s%> and may be <S%G2147>found<s%> by you to be not <S%G3634>what<s%> you <S%G2309>wish;<s%> that <S%G4458>perhaps<s%> [there may be] <S%G2054>strife,<s%> <S%G2205>jealousy,<s%> <S%G2372>angry<s%> <S%G2372>tempers,<s%> <S%G2052>disputes,<s%> <S%G2636>slanders,<s%> <S%G5587>gossip,<s%> <S%G5450>arrogance,<s%> <S%G181>disturbances;<s%>

I am afraid that when I <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> my <S%G2316>God<s%> may <S%G5013>humiliate<s%> me <S%G4314>before<s%> you, and I may <S%G3996>mourn<s%> over <S%G4183>many<s%> of <S%G3588>those<s%> who have <S%G4258>sinned<s%> in the <S%G4258>past<s%> and not <S%G3340>repented<s%> of the <S%G167>impurity,<s%> <S%G4202>immorality<s%> and <S%G766>sensuality<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> they have <S%G4238>practiced.<s%>
